"Is my tetanus vaccination up to date?" - thoughts tidying up ~100yo moth collection
@LoraxCate There used to be a spineless wonder of the year competition but they haven't run it since 2014 :(
@CAHutching but yeah educating about every single species is probably a case of diminishing returns in terms of conservation outcomes? (4/4)
@CAHutching outstanding cases where one species is the focus e.g. Hadramphus tuberculatus and the Mokohinau stag beetle (3/?)
@CAHutching and then promotion of communities/ecosystems showing how ambassador groups fit into them. You'd probably also get a few (2/?)
@CAHutching That's fair! I think it would involve a combination of ambassador species which stand in for diversity of a certain group (1/?)
@CAHutching Do you mean in terms of how best to promote them?
@Lanipai will post specific stats tests and stuff at a later date
